languages.text: {n}Старая женщина встает с колен и подходит к мужу.{/n} "Я знаю, ты хотел нас спасти. Но {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}еще можно все исправить{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Тилла встает с колен и подходит к мужу.{/n} "Я знаю, ты хотел нас спасти. Но еще можно все исправить".

languages.text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Старая женщина встает с колен и подходит к мужу.{/n} "Я знаю, ты хотел нас спасти. Но {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}еще можно все исправить{/d}".

{n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But there's still a way to set things right."

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau erhebt sich von den Knien und geht zu ihrem Mann.{/n} "Ich weiß, dass du versucht hast, uns zu retten. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Doch es lässt sich alles wieder gutmachen{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau erhebt sich von den Knien und geht zu ihrem Mann.{/n} "Ich weiß, dass du versucht hast, uns zu retten. Doch es lässt sich alles wieder gutmachen."

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme agenouillée se relève et s'approche de son mari.{/n} « Je sais que tu tentais de nous sauver, mais {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}il est encore possible d'arranger les choses{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme agenouillée se relève et s'approche de son mari.{/n} « Je sais que tu tentais de nous sauver, mais il est encore possible d'arranger les choses. »

languages.text: {n}老妇人站起身，走向她的丈夫。{/n}“我知道你是想救我们，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}但我们还有机会，还可以让一切重归正轨{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人站起身，走向她的丈夫。{/n}“我知道你是想救我们，但我们还有机会，还可以让一切重归正轨。”

languages.text: {n}老婦人はひざから立ち上がり、夫に近づいた。{/n}「あなたが私たちを救おうとしていたことは知っています。しかし、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}物事を正す方法はまだあります{/d}」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}老婦人はひざから立ち上がり、夫に近づいた。{/n}「あなたが私たちを救おうとしていたことは知っています。しかし、物事を正す方法はまだあります」

languages.text: {n}La anciana se levanta de su posición arrodillada y se acerca a su marido.{/n} «Sé que estabas intentando salvarnos, pero {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}aún se pueden arreglar las cosas{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana se levanta de rodillas y se acerca a su marido.{/n} «Sé que intentabas salvarnos. Pero aún se pueden arreglar las cosas».

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, dizlerinin üzerinden kalkıp kocasına yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Bizi kurtarmaya çalıştığını biliyorum ama {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}hâlâ işleri rayına sokabilirsin{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman rises from her knees and approaches her husband.{/n} "I know you were trying to save us. But {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}there's still a way to set things right{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, dizlerinin üzerinden kalkıp kocasına yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Bizi kurtarmaya çalıştığını biliyorum ama hâlâ işleri rayına sokabilirsin."
